law.catch_line: With the advice and consent of the Senate, the Governor shall appoint a Chairman....

text.section: With the advice and consent of the Senate, the Governor shall appoint a Chairman.

section.section: The term of the Chairman is 5 years and begins on July 1.
At the end of a term, the Chairman continues to serve until a successor qualifies.
A Chairman who is appointed after a term has begun serves for the rest of the term and until a successor qualifies.
